column20:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Carry all your work essentials in style with this super handy messenger bag from Merrell. The multiple compartments with smart allocation of space makes this piece the perfect companion to staying organised.

  • Brown messenger bag with black accents
column21: has a flap with a zipped opening
column23:
click-clasp closures and printed branding
One long adjustable strap with a shoulder pad and a top handle
Has paneled and stitched detail throughout
One main compartment with a laptop sleeve that is secured with a Velcro closure
Has an inner patch pocket that has a double patch pocket attached to it
An external zipped pocket at front with an inner organiser sleeve and two outer patch pockets
Has a slip pocket at the back
A stash pocket on either side with an elasticated mouth

one has a flap with buttoned closure
Padded mesh back
Weather resistant main flap
column25:
water resistant coated computer access pass-through zipper on top of main flap and water resistant bottom panel
Warranty: 3 months
